attributes.action: Make sure laws are consistent between police forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many police forces have stated in the press that they are not/will not police the newly introduced child restaint law due to not having adequate training or apparatus to enforce the law, therefore you can get a fine in one county but nothing in the neighbouring county yet the consequence of an accident involving a incorrectly restained child is the same
